articles.description: James Hillier is confident the rising Indian athletics star can achieve greater glory after bettering her national mark yet again at the world varsity games
articles.content: "Not personal best, not national record, not her bronze medal. All she spoke about was missing the Paris Olympics qualification by 0.01 seconds," James Hillier recounts his chat with his ward, 100m h… [+4355 chars]
